name: part_006
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】猫又おかゆ 2nd Live ＂ぺるそにゃ～りすぺくと＂ 【 #おかゆセカンド 】 [NM7_uUOAOlI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Audience excitement and visual introduction to the concert venue.

subtitles.original: 全然いらないじゃんか
subtitles.english: I don't need it at all, do I?

subtitles.original: 分かってくれないじゃんか
subtitles.english: You don't understand it at all, do you?

subtitles.original: 真っ当じゃないなって
subtitles.english: That it's not right...

subtitles.original: お前はしないけど
subtitles.english: You wouldn't say that, though.

subtitles.original: 全然笑えないじゃんか
subtitles.english: I can't laugh at all, can I?

subtitles.original: 面白くなりもしないじゃんか
subtitles.english: It's not getting interesting at all, is it?

subtitles.original: ああ こんなもんかって
subtitles.english: Ah, so this is it...

subtitles.original: よかれは期待か
subtitles.english: Was that well-meant expectation?

subtitles.original: そもそも話君のこととか
subtitles.english: To begin with, about you...

subtitles.original: 求めてることとか分からないんだ
subtitles.english: Or what you're seeking, I just don't know.

subtitles.original: 泥々になるまでに混んだ感情
subtitles.english: Emotions crowded until they turn to mud.

subtitles.original: 火傷しちゃうくらいアッチアッチ
subtitles.english: Hot enough to leave a burn.

subtitles.original: 笑顔に甘えてるんじゃないの
subtitles.english: Aren't you just riding on my smile?

subtitles.original: 優しさに溶かされてるんじゃないの
subtitles.english: Aren't you being melted by my kindness?

subtitles.original: 答え合わせじゃなくて
subtitles.english: It's not about checking for answers...

subtitles.original: たまに思うだけ気にしないで
subtitles.english: I just think it sometimes, so don't worry.

subtitles.original: ようこそアリーナ！
subtitles.english: Welcome to the arena!

subtitles.original: あかんべで忘れましょう
subtitles.english: Let's forget it with an 'Akanbe'.

subtitles.original: 正解はいらないのよ
subtitles.english: I don't need the correct answer.

subtitles.original: いいよ いいよ
subtitles.english: It's fine, it's fine.

subtitles.original: 押し殺したげちゃうわ
subtitles.english: I'll stifle it for you.

subtitles.original: あかんべを覚えたら
subtitles.english: Once you've learned 'Akanbe',

subtitles.original: 目一杯のドキドキしよう
subtitles.english: Let's make our hearts pound to the max.

subtitles.original: いいよ いいよ
subtitles.english: It's fine, it's fine.

subtitles.original: もっといい子になれたら開けましょう
subtitles.english: If you can be a better kid, let's open up.

subtitles.original: 知りもしないくせにわかったふり
subtitles.english: Pretending to know when you don't at all.

subtitles.original: それで好きだなんて面白いわ
subtitles.english: It's funny that you say you love me.

subtitles.original: 諦めの鼓動裏で鳴るハロー
subtitles.english: A 'Hello' ringing behind a pulse of resignation.

subtitles.original: 混ざり合うハートは狂喜狂喜
subtitles.english: Intertwining hearts in madness and ecstasy.

subtitles.original: どこまでを許せばいいのかって
subtitles.english: How much should I permit?

subtitles.original: ぐるぐる回る妄想をわかって
subtitles.english: Understand these spinning delusions.

subtitles.original: 頭の中を叩くアルト
subtitles.english: The alto voice knocking in my head.

subtitles.original: 欲望の音はどっちどっち
subtitles.english: Which one is the sound of desire?

subtitles.original: ちぎれた僕振って大満足
subtitles.english: Fully satisfied shaking my torn self.

subtitles.original: 腹が満たせりゃそれでいいだろ
subtitles.english: If your stomach's full, that's enough, right?

subtitles.original: ここにメインディッシュありますわ
subtitles.english: I've got the main dish right here.

subtitles.original: お口拭いておかわりはどうだい
subtitles.english: Wipe your mouth; how about seconds?

subtitles.original: あかんべのつづきとか
subtitles.english: The continuation of 'Akanbe'...

subtitles.original: 思ったってやらんないのよ
subtitles.english: Even if I think of it, I won't do it.

subtitles.original: だって だって
subtitles.english: Because, because...

subtitles.original: 虚しくなるだけだから
subtitles.english: It would only lead to emptiness.

subtitles.original: あかんべを覚えたら
subtitles.english: Once you've learned 'Akanbe',

subtitles.original: 目一杯の笑顔になれるわ
subtitles.english: You'll be able to smile to the fullest.

subtitles.original: だって だって そうさ
subtitles.english: Because, because, that's right...

subtitles.original: 僕は
subtitles.english: I am...

subtitles.original: あかんべで忘れましょう
subtitles.english: Let's forget it with an 'Akanbe'.

subtitles.original: 正解はいらないのよ
subtitles.english: I don't need the correct answer.

subtitles.original: いいよ いいよ
subtitles.english: It's fine, it's fine.

subtitles.original: 押し殺したげちゃうわ
subtitles.english: I'll stifle it for you.

subtitles.original: あかんべを覚えたら
subtitles.english: Once you've learned 'Akanbe',

subtitles.original: 目一杯のドキドキしよう
subtitles.english: Let's make our hearts pound to the max.

subtitles.original: いいよ いいよ
subtitles.english: It's fine, it's fine.

subtitles.original: もっといい子になれたら開けましょう
subtitles.english: If you can be a better kid, let's open up.

subtitles.original: ねえねえ びっくりしちゃった？
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, were you surprised?

subtitles.original: もしかして怖くなっちゃった？
subtitles.english: Did you maybe get scared?

subtitles.original: 嘘 全部なんちゃって
subtitles.english: Lies, it's all just kidding.

subtitles.original: 驚かせてごめんね
subtitles.english: Sorry for startling you.

subtitles.original: ねえねえ びっくりしちゃった？
subtitles.english: Hey, hey, were you surprised?

subtitles.original: もしかして怖くなっちゃった？
subtitles.english: Did you maybe get scared?

subtitles.original: 嘘 全部なんちゃって
subtitles.english: Lies, it's all just kidding.

subtitles.original: どちらが僕でしょうか
subtitles.english: I wonder which one is me?

subtitles.original: もう この深くで
subtitles.english: Already, deep down here,

subtitles.original: 君は言葉を待っていたんだ
subtitles.english: You were waiting for the words.

subtitles.original: 待っていたんだ 待っていたんだ
subtitles.english: You were waiting, you were waiting.

subtitles.original: 倒れないように
subtitles.english: So as not to fall,

subtitles.original: 伸ばした願いに
subtitles.english: To the wish I reached out...

subtitles.original: 応えていくだけだよ 応えていくだけだよ
subtitles.english: I'll just keep responding, I'll just keep responding.

subtitles.original: 与えることしかできないよ
subtitles.english: I can only give.

subtitles.original: 隙間から見えた希望
subtitles.english: The hope seen through the gaps.
